name: SuperSoccer
0:
”Alexa, open super soccer”
”Alexa, ask super soccer for premier league fixtures”
”Alexa, ask super soccer for liverpool results”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: super soccer
des:
For all you Soccer fans... 

****** NEW ******
Premium product now available for purchase:
• Goal Alerts Pack - monthly subscription with free trial period
Goal Alerts Pack lets you set up alerts for up to three different teams.
Whenever a goal is scored in a league match involving one of those teams, you'll receive a notification on your Alexa device!
*******************

You can get up-to-date English Premier League and Championship fixtures, results, top scorers, league table positions and club info.
Some examples of what you can ask for in the skill:

⚽ Fixtures:
• "next liverpool matches"
• "championship fixtures"
• "who's playing on saturday in the championship"

⚽ Results:
• "spurs results"
• "premier league results"

⚽ Table positions:
• "who's top of the premier league"
• "championship promotion places"
• "who's bottom of the premier league"

⚽ Top scorers:
• "golden boot"
• "championship top scorers"

⚽ Club info:
• "tell me about the gunners"

If you ask for fixtures/results and don't mention a club or league then I'll assume you mean the Premier League.
Any issues, get in touch at alexa@knownentity.com and we'll try and help out.
Have fun!
⚽ ⚽ ⚽
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
